sentences.en: A recurring recurring theme in his writing, as in Hemingway's, was man testing his humanlity masculinity.
sentences.cn: 与海明威相同, 在他的小说中反复出现的主题是男子气概.

sentences.en: boys trying to prove their masculinity
sentences.cn: 想证明自己的阳刚之气的男孩们

sentences.en: But what does it mean to embrace your masculinity?
sentences.cn: 但展现你的男子气概究竟是什么意思?

sentences.en: Children’s ideas of masculinity tend to come from their fathers.
sentences.cn: 儿童的男性观念往往来自他们的父亲。

sentences.en: Football is a bastion of masculinity in this area.
sentences.cn: 在该地区足球是男子汉的天地.

sentences.en: God includes masculinity and femininity within himself without having sexual gender.
sentences.cn: 神无性别,但含有男性与女性特质.

sentences.en: He felt it was a threat to his masculinity.
sentences.cn: 他觉得这对他的男子气概是一种威胁。

sentences.en: Let us work together to enjoy the kind of masculinity!
sentences.cn: 让我们一起去领略那种阳刚之气!

sentences.en: Masculinity may buy you dominance but not necessarily tip top physical condition.
sentences.cn: 男子气概可能能让你赢得控制力,但不一定表明身体状况很好. ”

sentences.en: Men associate the roughness of nonstandard working - class speech with masculinity.
sentences.cn: 男人们将不标准的劳动阶级粗话与阳刚气概联系在一起.

sentences.en: Motorcycle driving can train tree's tact, bravery and determines masculinity.
sentences.cn: 骑摩托车可以培养机智 、 勇敢、顽强的男子气.

sentences.en: Nick: Motorcycle driving can train tree's tact, bravery and determines masculinity.
sentences.cn: 尼克: 骑摩托车可以培养机智 、 勇敢、顽强的男子气.

sentences.en: The old ideas of masculinity do not work for most men.
sentences.cn: 对于大多数男人来说，关于男子气概的老套观点现在已不再适用了。

sentences.en: The right perfume or beer resolves doubts about femininity or masculinity.
sentences.cn: 恰当的香水或啤酒使人对女性气质或男性气概不再生疑.

sentences.en: The students associated science with masculinity and arts with effeminacy.
sentences.cn: 学生们把科学与阳刚气质联系起来,而把艺术与阴柔气质联系起来.

sentences.en: The third type is related to the latest published research on Chinese masculinity overseas.
sentences.cn: 第三类为海外中国的男性气质研究的最新成果.

sentences.en: Women really do vary in the degree of masculinity they prefer.
sentences.cn: 女性在欣赏的阳刚之气的程度上确实有差别.

words.tran_cn: 男性的；阳性的；男子气概的
使…雄性化；使男子化（尤指使女人具有男子特征）

trans.tran_en: the features and qualities considered to be typical of men
